svg.title: This is a root SVG element's title
This is a non-root SVG element title

svg.text: This contains only <title> This is a title
This contains only <desc> This is a desc
svg.a: This link contains <title>This is a title

a.text: This text contains <title> This is a title

a.xlink:title: This is an xlink:title attribute
a.text: This link contains <title> & xlink:title attr. This is a title

text.xlink:title: This is an xlink:title attribute but it isn't on a link
